entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
